lead_paragraph: The World Trade Organization is predicting that global trade will increase by a “disappointing” 2.8 percent this year, the same rate as last year.

headline.print_headline: W.T.O. Forecasts Mild Rise of 2.8% in 2016 Global Trade
headline.main: W.T.O. Forecasts Mild Rise of 2.8% in 2016 Global Trade

snippet: The World Trade Organization is predicting that global trade will increase by a “disappointing” 2.8 percent this year, the same rate as last year.
abstract: World Trade Organization predicts global trade will increase by only 2.8 percent in 2016, same rate as 2015, but could rise to 3.6 percent in 2017.
